member.remarks: Call routes.Kentico().MapActivitiesRoutes(); before you register all your routes. Furthermore, include script tag in your layout @Scripts.Render(Url.RouteUrl("KenticoLogActivityScript")) which is @Scripts.Render("Kentico.Activities/Logger/Logger.js") or create AJAX post request Kentico.Activities/Logger/Log.
